name: df-vts
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cvts, cmpo(s0, s1, co(cc, cmap, cn), cn0, cmpt(s2, cc, csu(s3, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s3), cmul, cv(s2)))))))))
comment: Define the Vinogradov trigonometric sums. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2021.)
